Title: Still Life
Plot: Allison is lead to an art gallery where she encounters the art of a popular artist. While looking at some of his paintings, 3-dimensional images emerge that make her believe that the artist is somehow involved in a crime. Joe gets a job offer from a former co-worker. This episode is partly in 3-D.
GuestStars: John Shea, Michael Cavanaugh, Bruce Gray, Mark Silverman, Kevin Alejandro, Susan Santiago, Harry Groener
